patthana17.27:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana17.27:1.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana17.27:3.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:3.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
